name: Ceremony of Growth
summary: You can alter your exoskeleton's size.
description:
You can alter your exoskeleton's size. You constantly gain the effects of enlarge. You can dismiss or resume these effects as an action, which has the concentrate trait.Traits

Conrasu: A people that are made of cosmic force given consciousness and housed within unique exoskeletons. Conrasus craft and use these weapons.
